page.title: 15A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content:
{ I get up at 9.30 watch videos and television until 12.o'clock. Whilst I'm watching it I have cereals and toast then go outside and ride on my bike until dinner. My{Sunday dinner could well be chicken, roast potatoes, sprouts, and gravy. After dinner I often call for a friend and take the dogs for a walk over the fields. When I return I spend the rest of the afternoon playing on my roller-skates in the road until tea is ready at about six o'clock . After tea I have a bath , watch television and sometimes read in bed before going to sleep at about nine o'clock.
{by Jane Gilbert (age 11)
